topic.title: darknet market on 0net
topic.body: would it be possible to make a darkweb market on zeronet? i guess all the realtime mechanics will be hard to code for zeronet?

topic.title: .bit adresses
topic.body: There is almost 700 adresses registered at ZeroName (43110/1Name2NXVi1RDPDgf5617UoW7xA6YrhM9F/) and 267 is pointing to the same address (15GAu5QYg34TLzD4b2WMpZSid9S2K6M54h) just someone who bought almost half of the registered addresses?

1_1KRDb5SVJe8Gjy9eYEQz62tJv73vavZdUn.body:
> [mtsvip](#comment_30_17tRugXJrS18zKWVEYqZCPisSTk43hqUzx): probably not too hard. everything is possible. it will come some day.

but how does 0net work? does everything have to be client side since there is no servers?
